text: Mario Balbuena González (April 16, 1959 – May 7, 2017), better known under the ring name Gran Apache and El Apache, was a Mexican luchador, or professional wrestler and trainer. He was born in Mexico City. Balbuena worked for Lucha Libre AAA Worldwide (AAA) from 1996 until his death in 2017, both as a wrestler and a trainer, having been involved in training almost all young wrestlers who worked for in that period of time. Balbuena died on May 7, 2017 from colorectal cancer in Mexico City at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in Mexico Category:Mexican professional wrestlers Category:Sportspeople from Mexico City
title: Gran Apache
